name: Gymnastic Trial
description:
Current prototype of a game I have been working on. I enjoy gymnastics so I decided to see if I could gamify it! Would suggest looking at the controls before getting started as there are quite a few!

No objective for this prototype, just a sandbox to play around in.

Known issues: Sometimes the animation for falling will trigger at strange times causing your character to get stuck in that animation.

Trampolines can be a bit strange at times.
